question: Who has won the 2017 China Open Tennis tournament?
explanation: Rafael Nadal, a Spanish professional tennis player, has won the 2017 China Open Tennis tournament by defeating Nick Kyrgios in the final by 6-2, 6-1 in Beijing, China. It is his 6th ATP title of the year. Nadal\'s six trophies this year include a record 10th title at the French Open and a third at the US Open.
